objects.text:
• Sleek Design with Digital Display
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Smart Controls with Multiple Cycles
Transform Your Home with Cutting-Edge Efficiency!

product_details.name: Insignia™ Smart Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Made Easy!
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital displays for contemporary home aesthetics
• 🔧 Front-loading washer and dryer with large capacity for family-sized loads
• 📱 Digital LED display with intuitive controls and multiple wash/dry cycles
• ⚡ Energy-efficient operation to help reduce utility bills
• 🌟 Stackable design perfect for saving space in apartments or small laundry rooms
• 🔄 Multiple temperature settings and customizable cycle options
• 💧 Advanced moisture sensing technology in dryer for optimal drying results
• 🏃 Quick wash and dry cycles available for time-saving convenience
• 🔊 Quiet operation with advanced noise reduction technology
• ⭐ Easy-access maintenance panels and lint filter for simple upkeep

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, tech-inspired layout divided vertically between a dark left section with gradient tones and a clean, light grey right side showcasing a washer and dryer set image. The layout effectively highlights five distinct text elements. The bold and impactful title (`heading`) introduces the theme, followed by a bright blue subtitle (`subheading`) to reinforce product identity. A descriptive bullet list (`description`) outlines key features. The prominent price (`price`) is styled in a futuristic blue font to draw attention. Below, a solid blue call-to-action button (`cta_background` with `cta` text) and a subtle tagline (`tagline`) complete the promotional message.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Navy: #2B2D42
- Deep Blue: #141526
- Sky Blue: #3498DB
- Medium Blue: #2980B9
- Light Grey: #F0F0F0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern washer-dryer unit dominated by a clean white (#FFFFFF) finish, creating a minimalist and premium look. Black (#000000) is used prominently for the door rims and inner drum, adding contrast and visual focus. The control panels integrate soft grays (#D3D3D3) and metallic silver (#C0C0C0), especially in the dial, giving a high-tech and sophisticated feel. Blue accents (#3399FF) on the interface highlight key functions, guiding the user’s attention effectively. Together, these colors blend with clean, precise lines, offering a balance of cleanliness and innovation. A suitable advertising palette includes white, black, silver, light gray, and electric blue.
